publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: Work of the literatures of Ethiopia and Eritrea

abstract.p:
The universal chronicle of was translated to Gǝʿǝz and augmented with accounts concerning the history of Ethiopia, possibly at the time of , see
5 . An abbreviation of this lenghty work was included in the column reserved to tārik in calendaric tables. These entries were in their turn again converted into an abbreviated text, , which forms the introduction of a type of . Other excerpts of the History are included as an introduction, , in other historiographic works, such as the .

revisionDesc.change: Added bibliography and updates text part

div.note:
This division into textparts and the generations' numeration follow the description in
71–83 .
